	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}

		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = scheme

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}

			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.1
		}

				scope:subdom > -10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.4.desc.3
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.190
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB: Down the Gullet
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.3.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room

		character = root

			}

		}

			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.5
		}
	}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}

			CHANGE = -2
		}

			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner

			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}

			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}

		name = LIDAoption.192
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.8.desc.4
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 1.5
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.194
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAc.9 = {
	# FM_CREAMPIE_REGULAR: Plowing the Fields
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.9.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.9.desc.6
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 30
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.196
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAc.11 = {
	# FM_CREAMPIE_BREED: Something to Remember Him By
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 99
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_99.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 104
				}
				# Lie Face Down
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_104.0
			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10094
				}
				# 94: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_94.10000
			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10097
				}
				# 97: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10098

				desc = sex_transition_98.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10100
				}
				# 100: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s #bold paralyzing#! barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition_100.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10101
				}
				# 101: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You try to find a moment to pull your knees under you, but each attempt is thwarted by his wild thrashing.\n
				desc = sex_transition_101.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10103
				}
				# 103: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_103.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 17
			}
			# defaulted to 99: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition_99.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 18
			}
			# defaulted to 104: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition_104.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.0
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.1
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub 
 NOT = { has_trait =pregnant }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub 
 has_trait = pregnant
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.7
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10 
NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.8
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10 
has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.9
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.10
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10 
has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.12
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10 
NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.13
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.14
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom 
 NOT = { has_trait =pregnant }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.15
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom 
 has_trait = pregnant
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.16
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait =pregnant } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.17
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait =pregnant 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.18
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -6
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 45.0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 45
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 45
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.198
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = ecstasy
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shock
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {

					exists = scope:sex_transition

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition

				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition

				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n

			}

			}

		}

			CHANGE = 2
		}

			CHARACTER_1 = root

			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}

			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}

		name = LIDAoption.199
	}

		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

	# MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND: A Load in Hand is Worth Two in the Bush

		}

	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = boredom

				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shame

			trigger = {

			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 116
				}
				# Handjob
				# You place your palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed.\n

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 128
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# Pulling away, you deprive him of the warmth of your mouth.\n
				desc = sex_transition_128.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10113
				}
				# 113: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# 
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
					}
					desc = sex_transition_113.0
				}
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_dom
					}
					desc = sex_transition_113.1
				}
				desc = sex_transition_113.2
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10115
				}
				# 115: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# You move to stop his climax, but realize that he did not last as long as you expected.\n
				desc = sex_transition_115.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10116
				}
				# 116: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# You place your palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed, but his tip seems to be pointing elsewhere...\n
				desc = sex_transition_116.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10125
				}
				# 125: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_125.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10128
				}
				# 128: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_128.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 24
			}
			# defaulted to 116: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			desc = sex_transition_116.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 128: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			desc = sex_transition_128.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.13.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10

			}
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.13.desc.3
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.200
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.18 = {
	# MF_ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS: Icing on the Cake
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.18.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}

			CHARACTER_1 = root

			chance = 15

		}

			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}

	}

		name = LIDAoption.202
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAc.14 = {
	# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM: Satisfying her Sweet Tooth
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.14.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = disgust
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 123
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You prepare to wring him dry with your dexterous tongue.\n
				desc = sex_transition_123.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10118
				}
				# 118: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_118.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10119
				}
				# 119: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_119.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10122
				}
				# 122: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_122.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 25
			}
			# defaulted to 123: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
			desc = sex_transition_123.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.14.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.3
		}
		desc = LIDAc.14.desc.4
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom } 
 NOT = { has_trait = lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.14.desc.7
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.203
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB: Down the Gullet

		}

	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 129
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# You don't resist when he plunges into your mouth to deposit his seed.\n
				desc = sex_transition_129.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 133
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# You don't have any say in it, or in anything else at the moment, as his mass fills your throat.\n
				desc = sex_transition_133.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10125
				}
				# 125: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_125.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10128
				}
				# 128: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_128.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10131
				}
				# 131: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_131.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 129: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_129.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 28
			}
			# defaulted to 133: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_133.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.15.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.15.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10

			}

		}

			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.15.desc.5
		}
	}

			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.204
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.17 = {
	# MF_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on Your Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.17.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = beg
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = dismissal
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 115
				}
				# Handjob
				# You abruptly stop your jerking motion and slap his cock, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition_115.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 122
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You pull back and slap his rod, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition_122.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10113
				}
				# 113: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# 
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
					}
					desc = sex_transition_113.0
				}
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_dom
					}
					desc = sex_transition_113.1
				}
				desc = sex_transition_113.2
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10115
				}
				# 115: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# You move to stop his climax, but realize that he did not last as long as you expected.\n
				desc = sex_transition_115.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10116
				}
				# 116: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# You place your palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed, but his tip seems to be pointing elsewhere...\n
				desc = sex_transition_116.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10118
				}
				# 118: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_118.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10119
				}
				# 119: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_119.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10122
				}
				# 122: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_122.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 24
			}
			# defaulted to 115: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition_115.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 25
			}
			# defaulted to 122: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.MF_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition_122.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.17.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.17.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.17.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAc.17.desc.3
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			add_character_modifier = {
				modifier = sexually_frustrated
				years = 1
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.205
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.20 = {
	# MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS: More Icing on the Cake
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.20.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}

				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 31
			}
			# defaulted to 143: EventsSex.MF_ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_143.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 29
			}
			# defaulted to 151: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_151.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 30
			}
			# defaulted to 157: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_157.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.19.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.19.desc.5
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0.3
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.207
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 30
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 30
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 30
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.209
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAc.23 = {
	# MF_CREAMPIE_BREED: Something to Remember You By
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.23.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night

		}

		}

		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}

		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 182
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_182.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 187
				}
				# Lie Face Down
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_187.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10178
				}
				# 178: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_178.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10181
				}
				# 181: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_181.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10183
				}
				# 183: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s #bold paralyzing#! barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition_183.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10184
				}
				# 184: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND failed
				# You try to find a moment to pull your knees under you, but each attempt is thwarted by his wild thrashing.\n
				desc = sex_transition_184.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10186
				}
				# 186: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_186.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 34
			}
			# defaulted to 182: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition_182.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 35
			}
			# defaulted to 187: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
			desc = sex_transition_187.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			desc = root_cum_m
		}
		desc = LIDAc.23.desc.0
		desc = LIDAc.23.desc.1
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_dom }

			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.4
		}
		desc = LIDAc.23.desc.5
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10 
scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.7
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.23.desc.8
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -6
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 45.0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 45
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 45
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.210
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
